text: The Bad Sleep Well is a 1960 Japanese crime drama movie directed by Akira Kurosawa and stars Toshiro Mifune, Masayuki Mori, Tatsuya Mihashi, Kyōto Kagawa, Kō Nishimura. It was distributed by Toho. ==Other websites== * * * The Bad Sleep Well at the Japanese Movie Database Category:1960 crime drama movies Category:Japanese crime movies Category:Japanese drama movies Category:Movies directed by Akira Kurosawa
title: The Bad Sleep Well
